TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DetailsViewUpdatedEventArgs extends System.EventArgs

span.span: Provides data for the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制會引發事件時的 [更新] 按鈕 (按鈕，以使用其`CommandName`屬性設定為 「 更新 」) 在控制項內按一下時，但之後控制項更新資料錄。The control raises the event when an Update button (a button with its `CommandName` property set to "Update") within the control is clicked, but after the control updates the record. 這可讓您提供執行自訂的常式，例如檢查更新作業的結果時就會發生此事件的事件處理常式。This allows you to provide an event handler that performs a custom routine, such as checking the results of an update operation, whenever this event occurs. A物件傳遞至事件處理常式，可讓您判斷受影響的記錄和任何可能發生的例外狀況的數目。A object is passed to the event handler, which allows you to determine the number of records affected and any exceptions that might have occurred. 若要判斷更新作業所影響的記錄數目，請使用屬性。To determine the number of records affected by the update operation, use the property. 使用屬性來判斷是否有發生任何例外狀況。Use the property to determine whether any exceptions occurred. 您也可以指定是否處理例外狀況在事件處理常式設定屬性。You can also indicate whether the exception was handled in the event handler by setting the property. 如果您需要存取已更新資料錄的索引鍵欄位值，使用屬性。If you need to access the key field values for the updated record, use the property. 使用可以存取的原始和更新的非索引鍵欄位值和屬性，分別。The original and updated non-key field values can be accessed using the and properties, respectively. 根據預設，控制權回到指定的模式在更新作業後的屬性。By default, the control returns to the mode specified by the property after an update operation. 若要保持控制項處於編輯模式，並設定屬性設`true`。To keep the control in edit mode, set the property to `true`. 如需如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 如需 類別之執行個體的初始屬性值清單，請參閱 建構函式。For a list of initial property values for an instance of the class, see the constructor. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用物件傳遞至事件處理常式，如事件，以判斷更新作業期間是否發生例外狀況。The following code example demonstrates how to use the object passed to the event handler for the event to determine whether an exception occurred during an update operation. [!code-aspx-csharp[DetailsViewUpdatedEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DetailsViewUpdatedEventArgs/CS/detailsviewupdatedeventargscs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[DetailsViewUpdatedEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DetailsViewUpdatedEventArgs/VB/detailsviewupdatedeventargsvb.aspx#1)]

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個建構函式初始化的新執行個體類別。Use this constructor to initialize a new instance of the class. 下表所顯示的是 類別之執行個體的初始屬性值。The following table shows initial property values for an instance of the class. |屬性Property|Initial valueInitial value| |--------------|-------------------| ||`affectedRows` 參數的值。The value of the `affectedRows` parameter.| ||中所包含的物件`e`參數。The object contained in the `e` parameter.| ||初始化為`false`。Initialized to `false`.| ||初始化為`false`。Initialized to `false`.| > [!NOTE] > 引發事件時，這個建構函式會使用主要由控制項開發人員。This constructor is used primarily by control developers when raising events.

summary.span: 取得更新作業所影響的資料列數目。

value.span: 更新作業所影響的資料列數目。

span.span: The number of rows affected by the update operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來判斷更新作業所影響的資料列數目。Use the property to determine the number of rows affected by the update operation. 這個值通常用於驗證適當數目的資料列已更新。This value is commonly used to verify that the appropriate number of rows was updated. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性來判斷更新作業所影響的資料列數目。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to determine the number of rows affected by an update operation. public: property Exception ^ Exception { Exception ^ get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 取得更新作業中引發的例外狀況 (如果有的話)。

span.span: Gets the exception (if any) that was raised during the update operation.

value.span: ，表示更新作業中引發的例外狀況。

span.span: An that represents the exception that was raised during the update operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來判斷例外狀況 （如果有的話） 更新作業期間所引發。Use the property to determine the exception (if any) that was raised during the update operation. 如果沒有引發例外狀況，這個屬性會傳回 `null`。If no exceptions were raised, this property returns `null`. > [!NOTE] > 如果引發例外狀況，而且您決定要處理的事件處理常式中的例外狀況，請務必設定屬性設`true`，則為例外狀況傳遞至下一步 方法的呼叫堆疊上進行處理。If an exception was raised and you decide to handle the exception in the event handler, be sure to set the property to `true`; otherwise, the exception is passed to the next method on the call stack for handling. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性來判斷更新作業期間是否發生例外狀況。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to determine whether an exception occurred during an update operation. [!code-aspx-csharp[DetailsViewUpdatedEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DetailsViewUpdatedEventArgs/CS/detailsviewupdatedeventargscs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[DetailsViewUpdatedEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DetailsViewUpdatedEventArgs/VB/detailsviewupdatedeventargsvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool ExceptionHandled { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

set: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出是否已在事件處理常式中處理更新作業中引發的例外狀況。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether an exception that was raised during the update operation was handled in the event handler.

value.span: 如果例外狀況在事件處理常式中已經過處理，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the exception was handled in the event handler; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當更新作業期間引發例外狀況時，使用屬性，指出是否處理例外狀況在事件處理常式。When an exception is raised during the update operation, use the property to indicate whether the exception was handled in the event handler. 當這個屬性設定為`true`，例外狀況會被視為處理，且不會進一步的呼叫堆疊。When this property is set to `true`, the exception is considered handled and is not passed further up the call stack. 如果這個屬性設定為`false`，例外狀況傳遞至下一步 方法的呼叫堆疊上進行處理。If this property is set to `false`, the exception is passed to the next method on the call stack for handling. 若要判斷引發的例外狀況，請使用屬性。To determine which exception was raised, use the property. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性來表示，處理例外狀況在事件處理常式。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to indicate that the exception was handled in the event handler. [!code-aspx-csharp[DetailsViewUpdatedEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DetailsViewUpdatedEventArgs/CS/detailsviewupdatedeventargscs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[DetailsViewUpdatedEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DetailsViewUpdatedEventArgs/VB/detailsviewupdatedeventargsvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 取得或設定指出 控制項是否在更新作業後停留在編輯模式中的值。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the control should remain in edit mode after an update operation.

value.span: 表示會在更新作業後停留在編輯模式中，否則為 。

span.span: to remain in edit mode after an update operation; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 根據預設，控制權回到指定的模式在更新作業後的屬性。By default, the control returns to the mode specified by the property after an update operation. 使用屬性來指定是否控制項應停留在編輯模式。Use the property to specify whether the control should remain in edit mode. 若要保持控制項處於編輯模式，將此屬性設定為`true`。To keep the control in edit mode, set this property to `true`. > [!NOTE] > 如果您想要在特定情況下覆寫預設的模式，則應該使用這個屬性。This property should be used if you want to override the default mode at a specific occasion. 如果控制項處於編輯模式，根據預設，請將需要屬性改為。If the control needs to remain in edit mode by default, set the property instead. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性，以保留處於編輯模式，在更新作業後的控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to keep a control in edit mode after an update operation. [!code-aspx-csharp[DetailsViewUpdatedEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DetailsViewUpdatedEventArgs/CS/detailsviewupdatedeventargscs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[DetailsViewUpdatedEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DetailsViewUpdatedEventArgs/VB/detailsviewupdatedeventargsvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Keys As IOrderedDictionary

summary.span: 取得字典，其包含已更新資料錄的索引鍵欄位名稱/值組。

span.span: Gets a dictionary that contains the key field name/value pairs for the updated record.

value.span: ，包含已更新資料錄索引鍵欄位名稱/值組的字典。

span.span: An that contains a dictionary of key field name/value pairs for the updated record.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來存取已更新的資料錄的索引鍵欄位的值。Use the property to access the values of the key field for an updated record. 例如，您可以使用這些值來更新記錄的記錄。For example, you can use these values to keep a log of updated records. 屬性會傳回該物件會實作介面。The property returns an object that implements the interface. 物件包含物件表示已更新資料錄的欄位。The object contains objects that represent the fields of the updated record. > [!NOTE] > 您也可以當作捷徑使用，使用的索引子物件來存取欄位值直接。As a shortcut, you can also use the indexer of the object to access the field values directly. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性來存取已更新的資料錄的索引鍵欄位的值。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to access the values of the key field for an updated record. [!code-aspx-csharp[DetailsViewUpdatedEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DetailsViewUpdatedEventArgs/CS/detailsviewupdatedeventargscs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[DetailsViewUpdatedEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DetailsViewUpdatedEventArgs/VB/detailsviewupdatedeventargsvb.aspx#1)]

span.span: Gets a dictionary that contains the new field name/value pairs for the updated record.

value.span: ，包含已更新資料錄新欄位名稱/值組的字典。

span.span: An that contains a dictionary of the new field name/value pairs for the updated record.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來存取新的欄位值更新記錄。Use the property to access the new field values for the updated record. 例如，您可以使用這些值來更新記錄的記錄。For example, you can use these values to keep a log of updated records. 屬性會傳回該物件會實作介面。The property returns an object that implements the interface. 物件包含物件表示已更新資料錄的欄位。The object contains objects that represent the fields of the updated record. > [!NOTE] > 您也可以當作捷徑使用，使用的索引子物件來存取欄位值直接。As a shortcut, you can also use the indexer of the object to access the field values directly. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性來存取使用者輸入非索引鍵欄位的已更新資料錄的新值。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to access the new values entered by the user for the non-key fields of the updated record. [!code-aspx-csharp[DetailsViewUpdatedEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DetailsViewUpdatedEventArgs/CS/detailsviewupdatedeventargscs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[DetailsViewUpdatedEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DetailsViewUpdatedEventArgs/VB/detailsviewupdatedeventargsvb.aspx#1)]
